articles.title: Thompson leads Capitals to shutout win over struggling Maple Leafs
articles.description: Logan Thompson earned his second shutout of the season, Jakob Chychrun scored twice and the Washington Capitals rebounded from a pair of ugly losses, beating the Toronto Maple Leafs 4-0 on Thursday night. articles.title: Worst win ever: Edmonton Oilers beat Boston Bruins, lose Tristan Jarry
articles.description: If there’s any such thing as a crushing win, the Edmonton Oilers suffered one Thursday night in Boston. articles.title: Takeaways: Ottawa Senators and Linus Ullmark shutdown Pittsburgh Penguins
articles.description: A textbook two points from the Ottawa Senators. They were strong from start to finish. The Senators put together three of their best periods of the season to score a 4-0 victory over Sidney Crosby and the Pittsburgh Penguins on Thursday night at the Canadian Tire Centre. articles.title: Call of the Wilde: Canadiens dominate Blackhawks as Montreal bests Chicago 4-1
articles.description: The Habs faced Chicago without Connor Bedard in the lineup on Thursday night, and he's likely not going to be back before the start of the new year. Brian Wilde has more.

articles.title: Explosion forces closure of Southern Alberta arena
articles.description: An explosion inside the Zamboni room of Taber’s community centre on Wednesday has forced the closure of the town’s arena facilities and curling club. articles.title: Small Alberta business owner caught up in a Trump tariff nightmare
articles.description: 'Like pulling hen's teeth': That's how one Alberta small business owner describes her struggle to get answers about a big tariff bill after a recent sale to an American customer.
